How It Works

Three simple steps to invisible communication

01

Connect Identity

Enter your username. Your NaCl encryption keypair (Curve25519) is generated automatically on your device. Private keys never leave your browser.

02

Choose Your Channel

Send encrypted DMs, join public channels, or create private groups. Each uses a different encryption scheme optimized for its use case.

03

Ghost Signal

Messages are encrypted before leaving your device. The server stores only ciphertext. Secret messages self-destruct and their existence is proven on Aleo.
